summary: Build a romantic, interactive “Hug Day” slideshow webpage with a dreamy pastel blue vibe, couple-hugging scene, animated text, interactive controls, optional background music toggle, and responsive design.
architectural_notes: Implement as single-page web app using HTML/CSS/JS (or React if preferred) with responsive mobile-first layout.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Romantic outdoor illustration with a hugging couple among abundant blue flowers; girl has dark brown hair and a blue princess gown; boy has black hair and a sky-blue shirt (hug-day-scene.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Soft semi-transparent heart shape/icon suitable for floating animation overlay, pastel pink/red tone (heart-particle.dim_128x128.png)
- Single flower petal or small flower particle sprite in soft pastel blue/white for drifting animation (petal-particle.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page, responsive interactive slideshow for “Hug Day” with soft fade/slide transitions between slides and a cohesive dreamy romantic vibe using light blue and pastel tones.

Implement the main scene slide content to match the provided description: an outdoor location filled with pretty blue flowers, a couple standing close and hugging lovingly (girl: dark brown hair, beautiful blue princess gown; boy: black hair, sky-blue shirt). Overlay the headline text above the couple: “HAPPY HUG DAY” in a large elegant romantic font, and show the bottom note: “Cant hug u physically right now so sending u the virtual ones”.

Add interactive slideshow controls: Next and Previous buttons with accessible labels, keyboard support (Left/Right arrow or Tab + Enter), and disabled or wrapped behavior at the ends (choose one and implement consistently).
Add smooth fade-in animation for on-screen text (headline and bottom note) when the slide appears, synchronized with the slide transition for a soft romantic feel.

Implement ambient romantic effects on the slideshow page: floating heart animations, soft glowing effects, and gentle flower/petal animations in the background that do not obstruct readability of the main text.

Add optional soft romantic instrumental background music with a visible toggle button (play/pause). Ensure the default behavior does not violate typical browser autoplay restrictions (user interaction required before playback).
Add generated static image assets needed for the scene and effects under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into the slideshow (do not serve images through the backend).
